prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a sturdy build and a glowing core.
I want a playful ghost-type Pokemon with a mischievous grin and floating abilities.
Generate a water-type Pokemon that resembles an ancient creature with sharp fins.
Make a steel-type Pokemon with metallic armor and glowing eyes, ready for battle.
Imagine a ground-type Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a rugged exterior.
Design a mythical Pokemon that combines elements of earth and machinery.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a unique blend of colors and a powerful stance.
